Key Match Events: Wales went into their first ever shootout with 10 men after Chris Mepham was sent off in added time of extra time for a second yellow card
James' miss in the shootout left Wales unable to qualify for the Euro 2024
Poland's victory at the Cardiff City Stadium secured a fifth straight appearance at the European Championship
Pre-Game Insights: Wales manager Rob Page said, 'We are the better team, we will go on to win this game'
Post-Match Reflections: Wales' manager Robert Page shared, 'One kick away from qualifying and it hurts. It is a cruel game'
Poland's manager Michal Probierz said, 'For us the most important thing was to play our own game and that's what we've done'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gareth Bale retired after the 2022 World Cup in Qatar
Wales thrashed Finland 4-1 in the playoff semifinal last week
The match was played at the Cardiff City Stadium with an attendance of 31,876
